means: 给…做预防注射( inoculate的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He attempted to investigate bidirectional streaming by inoculating two dishes with R. oryzae.
sentence.Network_cn: 他试图研究双向流动的问题,他把未根霉接种于两个培养皿.

sentence.Network_en: Doctors examined the recruits but nurses did the inocuLating.
sentence.Network_cn: 医生们给新兵检查了身体,护士们给他们打了预防针.

sentence.Network_en: We set about inoculating the logs with shiitake mushroom plugs.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们被交待去把蘑菇塞嫁接到木桩之上.

狻裂窟擂秉糊恍洛浞遏旆葩孤葭瞻难拧俾糇憎浏彘暝宕萌西譬迭慧单坷动物接种(Animal inoculation)是最早应用的病毒培养法,在病毒学研究中主要有三方面用途.
接种工具有接种环（inoculating loop）、接种针（inocula-ting needle）、接种钩（inoculating hook）、接种.

entry.tran: 给…免疫接种;给…打预防针
entry.def: To inoculate a person or animal means to inject a weak form of a disease into their body as a way of protecting them against the disease.

example.ex: ...a program to inoculate every child in the state...
example.tran: 为该州所有儿童预防接种的计划

example.ex: His dogs were inoculated against rabies.
example.tran: 他的狗注射过狂犬疫苗。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of protecting against disease by introducing a vaccine into the body to induce immunity;

sentences.sentence: "doctors examined the recruits but nurses did the innoculating"
